website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, practical option for any home, office, or warehouse.
pros: Powered by an adapter or the unit's built-in rechargeable battery
Can be placed on a desk or hung on a wall

customer_reviews.title: You could have a better product.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I find wrong with your product is the handset cord. I mean it stretches out no longer than a foot and on top of that they quit using the curly cord because it always gets tangled up. Then you made it so that it can’t be replaced with something more usable. Send everyone out replacement cords with instructions, or at least improve any others before you ship them. If I wasn’t yanking the base up every time I answered I would be very pleased with this product. Everything else about the product is top shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vandiver

customer_reviews.title: After contacting the supplier all of great not. Great product and great product support.
customer_reviews.text: I'm having trouble pairing the units. I purchased the two phone set and it worked perfectly. Then I purchased the three phone set and it worked perfectly . Then I tried to pair them together and now the ones that did work , no longer work. I must not have understood the directions. The directions don't make sense to me. Does anyone know how to program them ? Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Ron K

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Intercom
customer_reviews.text: New house had intercom that stopped working. Not being able to find someone to repair bought these. Work great need in this big house.More stylish than old monitors. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: good quality and clear sound, a little confusing to use though
customer_reviews.author: Jose D.

customer_reviews.title: Reception is Great
customer_reviews.text: These work great I would have given it 5 stars but it was a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Job, using UHF it will defnitely rule in mountain locations
customer_reviews.text: Living up in the jungle, I needed some sort of interphone between the property dependence. This is the ideal item for what I was looking for. It covers quite impressive distance considering my environment (mountain slope with a LOTs of trees) and I was amazed by the plug and play of this appliances. I ordered only three to test, and want to order more, but they seems to no longer be available which is a real shame, its an outstanding product. If anyone knows where to buy more, please let us know
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: The system just doesn’t work! We have tried everything but no success. We would send it back but we live in the Bahamas so it is just not worth it. Any ideas from anyone?
customer_reviews.author: Angie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Reception is very clear
customer_reviews.text: This phone system works very well. I purchased it in order to communicate between 3 different buildings without having to install land lines. They've worked great so far. The reception is very clear. It would be nice if they had a say to adjust the call volume though.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very clear reception
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected and hoped for. Easy to use and very clear reception. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Red Bull

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a preschool so all teacher could communicate in different classrooms and call the front office unfortunately they didn’t work well and ended up sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Never looses comunícate to other line
customer_reviews.text: Liked very much because they’re simply Eazy to handle, very helpful at my church!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, one of mine came with the balance weights inside loose, but was an easy fix
customer_reviews.author: wayne De Silva

product_meta.title: 3pcs Wireless Intercom System 433Mhz Secure Interphone Handsets Extendable for Hotel Warehouse Office Home
product_meta.description:
A wireless intercom system can be a convenient way to communicate throughout your house, office or warehouse. 

This Plug & Play Wireless Intercom is very simple to use, clear two way communication and has an impressive 100 meters within building and 800 meters in the open field without barrier transmission. 

Size: 217*112*70mm 
Wireless intercom range: 433MHz 
Air transfer rate: 256K 
Power: DC 5V 
Built inside Li-battery: 3.7V 1100mA 
Standby currunt: 6.5mA 
Working current: 400mA 
Charging current: 300mA 
Adapter: Input AC 110V, Output DC 5V 
Adapter cable length: 1.5M / 4.9 feet 

How to use? 
1. Simply plug and play 
2. The intercoms ID code had been set. the ID code is listed on the top right corner of device. 
3. Full charged the intercom or plug with adapter to power socket directly, turn on switch at the bottom. 
4. Dial the ID nubmer(1, 2, 3) for which you want to call and click call button, the called device will rings, pick up and answer the call. 

Package included: 
User manual 
3pcs x adapters 
3pcs x intercoms
feature_bullets: Wireless intercom system, No telephone wires needed, Save your telephone bills
Clear Voice and Secure Digital Communication. 433MHz working frequency, anti-interference signal. It needs no installation nor an installer, simply plug and use
Rechargeable battery built inside, works with or without electricity power
Long communication range, distance up to 800M depending on the environment
Can be placed on desk or mounted on any surface, horizontally on wall surface or vertically on any flat surface

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars27 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
